title: 512 Brigade of SL Army offers scholarships to ten more students in Jaffna
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Sri Lanka Army- Security Forces Head Quarters in Jaffna has launched another social project to help students from poorer backgrounds by providing ten scholarships in Jaffna recently. This is one of their ongoing educational and social projects to encourage students who face financial difficulties in the area. So far…
